bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Vice admiral, United States Navy; captain, U.S.S. Marblehead, 1940-1942; president, Military Commission on War Crimes in the Pacific Area, 1946-1949.

scopecontent.p: Recruiting dramatization concerning the USS Marblehead
Dramatization detailing the launch and story of the attack on the USS Marblehead in 1942. Original recording date of 21 Jun 1943. Hoover's copy is a 16 Sep 1956 "dubb"

did.unittitle: Sound reenactments of war crimes trials

scopecontent.p: A reenactment of war crimes trials held in Guam of Japanese military officers. The Japanese are on trial for various crimes against American soldiers. Charges include, but are not limited to, murder and cannibalism. A panel discussion reflecting on the trials follows. A broadcast by a U.S. forces station in Guam. Labels mention: James Ellison, James Young, Flynn, USO Troupe
